topic.title: Response Results
topic.shortdesc: returns the API responses in JSON format.

body.p: The HTTP status code for a success response or an error response is 200 OK.

section.title: Success response example
section.p: Every successful response has a "Success" status. For some API responses, the relevant response parameters will be displayed.

section.title: Error response example
section.p: Every error response has a "Failed" status and an error code.
